W12_EVAR_COMM_EXIT01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_EXIT01_000_DETAIL.text: You should be able to leave this world from here.

W12_EVAR_COMM_EXIT02_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_EXIT02_000_DETAIL.text: You should be able to leave this world from here.

W12_LTXT_COMM_TOWN01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_TOWN01_000_DETAIL.text: A frozen, mostly silent town. All you hear is the sound of wind and a faint noise resembling the cries of townsfolk.

W12_LTXT_COMM_TOWN01_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_TOWN01_010_DETAIL.text: A newly thawed town in the mountains. You hear cheerful voices coming from within.

W12_LTXT_COMM_TOWN02_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_TOWN02_000_DETAIL.text: A large frozen city. Its buildings and people have all been turned to ice, making it impossible to enter.

W12_LTXT_COMM_TOWN02_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_TOWN02_010_DETAIL.text: A large, newly thawed city built in the architectural style of the old empire. It's once again as lively as ever.

W12_LTXT_COMM_ARCHEOCAMP01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_ARCHEOCAMP01_000_DETAIL.text: The survey team's camp at the bathhouse ruins has been frozen. Will you find frozen team members here?

W12_LTXT_COMM_ARCHEOCAMP01_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_ARCHEOCAMP01_010_DETAIL.text: The survey team researching the bathhouse ruins lives in this camp—hence the comfortable tents.

W12_LTXT_COMM_ARCHEOCAMP02_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_ARCHEOCAMP02_000_DETAIL.text: The survey team's camp at the watchtower ruins has been frozen. Will you find frozen team members here?

W12_LTXT_COMM_ARCHEOCAMP02_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_ARCHEOCAMP02_010_DETAIL.text: The survey team researching the watchtower ruins lives in this camp—hence the comfortable tents.

W12_LTXT_COMM_ARCHEOCAMP03_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_ARCHEOCAMP03_000_DETAIL.text: The survey team's camp at the church ruins has been frozen. Will you find frozen team members here?

W12_LTXT_COMM_ARCHEOCAMP03_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_ARCHEOCAMP03_010_DETAIL.text: The survey team researching the church ruins lives in this camp—hence the comfortable tents.

W12_LTXT_COMM_LADDERFOLDED_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_LADDERFOLDED_000_DETAIL.text: A ladder that has been stowed.

W12_LTXT_COMM_LADDER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_LADDER_000_DETAIL.text: A sturdy ladder you can use to conquer cliffs.

W12_LTXT_COMM_RUINS01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_RUINS01_000_DETAIL.text: The ruins of an Imperial-era bathhouse. Researchers are currently attempting to unravel its history.

W12_LTXT_COMM_RUINS02_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_RUINS02_000_DETAIL.text: The ruins of an Imperial-era church. Researchers are currently attempting to unravel its history.

W12_LTXT_COMM_RUINS03_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_RUINS03_000_DETAIL.text: The ruins of an Imperial-era watchtower. Researchers are currently attempting to unravel its history.

W12_LTXT_COMM_WINDMILL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_WINDMILL_000_DETAIL.text: This windmill was built to mill flour. Now that it's frozen, however, it can no longer do so.

W12_LTXT_COMM_WINDMILL_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_WINDMILL_010_DETAIL.text: This windmill is now free of ice. Its fine blades catch the wind and spin as it mills grain.

W12_LTXT_COMM_MINE01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_MINE01_000_DETAIL.text: A place where brawny miners dig for coal. There is a danger that fiends will emerge from tunnels that have been mined too heavily.

W12_LTXT_COMM_MINE02_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_MINE02_000_DETAIL.text: A place where brawny miners dig for copper. You sense something unpleasant lurking deep within its tunnels.

W12_LTXT_COMM_MINE03_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_MINE03_000_DETAIL.text: The entrance to this mine was seemingly sealed long ago. You find yourself curious as to why.

W12_LTXT_COMM_CABIN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_CABIN_000_DETAIL.text: A hut containing tools needed to live the mountain life. Carefully chosen by a lumberjack, they are all in pristine condition.

W12_LTXT_COMM_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: This cable car would ordinarily take you to the church at the ravine entrance—as well as the ski slope—but it's currently not in operation.

W12_LTXT_COMM_FENCEGATE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_FENCEGATE_000_DETAIL.text: The giant gates leading to the Ice Palace. They won't budge, perhaps due to being frozen.

W12_LTXT_COMM_FENCEGATE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_FENCEGATE_010_DETAIL.text: You'll need to break the seal on the gates in order to go inside. Doing so will require specific artifacts.

W12_LTXT_COMM_FENCEGATE_OPENED_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_FENCEGATE_OPENED_000_DETAI.text: The Ice Palace's gates are no longer sealed.

W12_LTXT_COMM_ICECASTLE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_ICECASTLE_100_DETAIL.text: The palace where the final emperor was sealed away.

W12_LTXT_COMM_ICECASTLE_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_ICECASTLE_200_DETAIL.text: The palace where the final emperor was sealed away.

W12_LTXT_COMM_ICECASTLE_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_ICECASTLE_300_DETAIL.text: The palace where the final emperor was sealed away.

W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER01_000_DETAIL.text: This villager looks to have been frozen while taking a walk. You wonder if there's a way to free them.

W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER02_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER02_000_DETAIL.text: This skier looks to have been frozen while out on the slopes. You wonder if there's a way to free them.

W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER03_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER03_000_DETAIL.text: This miner looks to have been frozen while carrying coal. You wonder if there's a way to free them.

W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER04_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER04_000_DETAIL.text: This farmer looks to have been frozen while hard at work. You wonder if there's a way to free them.

W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER05_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER05_000_DETAIL.text: This miner looks to have been frozen while standing watch at the mine's entrance. You wonder if there's a way to free them.

W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER06_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER06_000_DETAIL.text: This lumberjack looks to have been frozen while splitting wood. You wonder if there's a way to free them.

W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER07_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER07_000_DETAIL.text: This researcher looks to have been frozen while on a survey mission. You wonder if there's a way to free them.

W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER08_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER08_000_DETAIL.text: This researcher looks to have been frozen while on a survey mission. You wonder if there's a way to free them.

W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER09_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER09_000_DETAIL.text: This miner looks to have been frozen on their way into the copper mine. You wonder if there's a way to free them.

W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER10_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER10_000_DETAIL.text: This researcher looks to have been frozen while on a survey mission. You wonder if there's a way to free them.

W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER11_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_VILLAGER11_000_DETAIL.text: This villager looks to have been frozen while taking photographs. You wonder if there's a way to free them.

W12_GIMK_COMM_FUNICULARTOP_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_GIMK_COMM_FUNICULARTOP_000_DETAIL.text: You can use the cable car to reach the ski slope and church ruins at the ravine's entrance.

W12_GIMK_COMM_FUNICULARMIDDLE_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W12_GIMK_COMM_FUNICULARMIDDLE_000_TITLE.text: Cable Car Station: Ski Slope Entrance

W12_GIMK_COMM_FUNICULARMIDDLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_GIMK_COMM_FUNICULARMIDDLE_000_DETAIL.text: You can use the cable car to access the mountaintop hut or the church ruins.

W12_GIMK_COMM_FUNICULARDOWN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_GIMK_COMM_FUNICULARDOWN_000_DETAIL.text: You can use the cable car to access the mountaintop hut or the ski slope.

W12_LTXT_COMM_FUNICULARMIDDLE_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_FUNICULARMIDDLE_000_TITLE.text: Cable Car Station: Ski Slope Entrance

W12_LTXT_COMM_FUNICULARMIDDLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_FUNICULARMIDDLE_000_DETAIL.text: You can use the cable car to access the mountaintop hut or the church ruins.

W12_LTXT_COMM_FUNICULARDOWN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_FUNICULARDOWN_000_DETAIL.text: You can use the cable car to access the mountaintop hut or the ski slope.

W12_GIMK_COMM_LADDERTOP_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_GIMK_COMM_LADDERTOP_000_DETAIL.text: This will let you reach the bottom of the cliff.

W12_GIMK_COMM_LADDERDOWN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_GIMK_COMM_LADDERDOWN_000_DETAIL.text: This will let you reach the top of the cliff.

W12_GIMK_COMM_SKIPOLE_DOWN_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_GIMK_COMM_SKIPOLE_DOWN_DETAIL.text: Flags used in the skiing challenge. You'll need to use them well to succeed.

W12_LTXT_COMM_SKIPOLE_UP_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_LTXT_COMM_SKIPOLE_UP_DETAIL.text: These flags are used in a skiing challenge.

W12_EVAR_COMM_LADDERTOP_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_LADDERTOP_000_DETAIL.text: You can create a shortcut to the bottom of the cliff by lowering this ladder.

W12_EVAR_COMM_MARION_DIALOG_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_MARION_DIALOG_000_DETAIL.text: Marion, the mayor of Duvall, wants to talk to you.

W12_EVAR_COMM_MORGANE_DIALOG_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_MORGANE_DIALOG_000_DETAIL.text: Morgane the skier wants to talk to you.

W12_EVAR_COMM_MORGANE_DIALOG_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_MORGANE_DIALOG_010_DETAIL.text: You successfully completed the skiing challenge! Go claim your reward from Morgane.

W12_EVAR_COMM_MORGANE_DIALOG_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_MORGANE_DIALOG_020_DETAIL.text: You successfully completed the pro-level skiing challenge! Go claim your reward from Morgane.

W12_EVAR_COMM_ERIC_DIALOG_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_ERIC_DIALOG_000_DETAIL.text: This mine seems to have quite a history, so perhaps you will find artifacts here. The deeper inside you go, however, the more dangers you will face.

W12_EVAR_COMM_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_DETAIL.text: Fiends have been messing up Guillaume's fields. If someone doesn't stop them, this season's crop will be lost.

W12_EVAR_COMM_ESPERANCE_DIALOG_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_ESPERANCE_DIALOG_000_DETAI.text: Perhaps you will find artifacts here. You should speak with Esperance, who's in charge of the mine.

W12_EVAR_COMM_REMI_DIALOG_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_REMI_DIALOG_000_DETAIL.text: This mine has been around for quite some time, so you may find artifacts here. However, there may be more dangerous things sleeping here as well.

W12_EVAR_COMM_SANDRINE_DIALOG_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_SANDRINE_DIALOG_000_DETAIL.text: Sandrine, the mayor of Varsailles, wants to talk to you.

W12_EVAR_COMM_ESPERANCE_KEYQUEST_110_DET.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_ESPERANCE_KEYQUEST_110_DET.text: Will you find the artifacts you require to open the Ice Palace's gates in the coal mine?

W12_EVAR_COMM_ESPERANCE_KEYQUEST_111_DET.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_ESPERANCE_KEYQUEST_111_DET.text: Will you find the artifacts you require to open the Ice Palace's gates in the copper mine?

W12_EVAR_COMM_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_DETAIL.text: Virgile has only recently woken up, and is still a bit groggy. He also seems to need help. Perhaps you should speak to him?

W12_EVAR_COMM_VIRGILE_QUEST_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_VIRGILE_QUEST_010_DETAIL.text: You should give Virgile the firewood he requested.

W12_EVAR_COMM_RUINS01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_RUINS01_000_DETAIL.text: The ruins of an Imperial-era bathhouse. You can search for artifact fragments here.

W12_EVAR_COMM_RUINS02_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_RUINS02_000_DETAIL.text: The ruins of an Imperial-era church. You can search for artifact fragments here.

W12_EVAR_COMM_RUINS03_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_RUINS03_000_DETAIL.text: The ruins of an Imperial-era watchtower. You can search for artifact fragments here.

W12_EVAR_COMM_MINE01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_MINE01_000_DETAIL.text: You sense fiends in this coal mine, but they should be easy enough to handle.

W12_EVAR_COMM_MINE02_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_MINE02_000_DETAIL.text: You sense fiends in this copper mine, but they should be easy enough to handle.

W12_EVAR_COMM_MINE03_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_MINE03_010_DETAIL.text: You should be able to force the entrance to this mine open. You sense powerful fiends within, so make sure you're prepared before entering.

W12_EVAR_COMM_ALEXANDRE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_ALEXANDRE_000_DETAIL.text: You found a boy who isn't frozen. He seems like he's in a bit of a daze, but maybe you can get him to talk.

W12_EVAR_COMM_MARION_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_MARION_000_DETAIL.text: Marion, the mayor of Duvall, was frozen while out on a stroll. Perhaps you can use one of the matches to thaw her?

W12_EVAR_COMM_MORGANE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_MORGANE_000_DETAIL.text: Morgane is a skier who was frozen while skiing. Perhaps you can use one of the matches to thaw her?

W12_EVAR_COMM_ERIC_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_ERIC_000_DETAIL.text: Eric is a miner who was frozen while transporting coal. Perhaps you can use one of the matches to thaw him?

W12_EVAR_COMM_GUILLAUME_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_GUILLAUME_000_DETAIL.text: Guillaume is a farmer who was frozen while working on his farm. Perhaps you can use one of the matches to thaw him?

W12_EVAR_COMM_ESPERANCE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_ESPERANCE_000_DETAIL.text: Esperance is a miner who was frozen while standing watch at the mine's entrance. Perhaps you can use one of the matches to thaw her?

W12_EVAR_COMM_VIRGILE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_VIRGILE_000_DETAIL.text: Virgile is a lumberjack who was frozen while splitting wood. Perhaps you can use one of the matches to thaw him?

W12_EVAR_COMM_GABRIEL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_GABRIEL_000_DETAIL.text: Gabriel is a researcher who was frozen while on a survey mission. Perhaps you can use one of the matches to thaw him?

W12_EVAR_COMM_ROMAIN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_ROMAIN_000_DETAIL.text: Romain is a researcher who was frozen while on a survey mission. Perhaps you can use one of the matches to thaw him?

W12_EVAR_COMM_REMI_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_REMI_000_DETAIL.text: Remi is a miner who was frozen while heading to the copper mine. Perhaps you can use one of the matches to thaw him?

W12_EVAR_COMM_LEIA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_LEIA_000_DETAIL.text: Leia is a researcher who was frozen while on a survey mission. Perhaps you can use one of the matches to thaw her?

W12_EVAR_COMM_SANDRINE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_SANDRINE_000_DETAIL.text: Sandrine, the mayor of Varsailles, was frozen while taking photographs. Perhaps you can use one of the matches to thaw her?

W12_EVAR_COMM_LEIA_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_LEIA_100_DETAIL.text: Leia is a researcher. Perhaps she knows something about the final emperor and the seal.

W12_EVAR_COMM_GABRIEL_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_GABRIEL_100_DETAIL.text: Gabriel is a researcher. Perhaps he knows something about the final emperor and the seal.

W12_EVAR_COMM_ROMAIN_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_ROMAIN_100_DETAIL.text: Romain is a researcher. Perhaps he knows something about the final emperor and the seal.

W12_EVAR_COMM_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_DETAIL.text: Does Duvall's library hold anything that will lead you to a symbol of melting?

W12_EVAR_COMM_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_DETA.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_DETA.text: Does Varsailles's museum hold anything that will lead you to a symbol of melting?

W12_EVAR_COMM_RUIN_THERMAE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_RUIN_THERMAE_000_DETAIL.text: The ruins of an Imperial-era bathhouse. Will you find artifact fragments here?

W12_EVAR_COMM_RUIN_CHAPEL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_RUIN_CHAPEL_000_DETAIL.text: The ruins of an Imperial-era church. Will you find artifact fragments here?

W12_EVAR_COMM_RUIN_TOWER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_RUIN_TOWER_000_DETAIL.text: The ruins of an Imperial-era watchtower. Will you find artifact fragments here?

W12_EVAR_COMM_CABIN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_CABIN_000_DETAIL.text: As a reward for helping Virgile, you can take possession of whatever is in the hut. See if you can find anything useful.

W12_GIMK_COMM_WOODPILE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_GIMK_COMM_WOODPILE_010_DETAIL.text: Bundles of firewood are lying here. You should gather them up and take them to Virgile.

W12_EVAR_COMM_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: This cable car would ordinarily take you to the church at the ravine entrance—as well as the ski slope—but it's currently not in operation. You sense something dangerous within.

W12_EVAR_COMM_FENCEGATE_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_FENCEGATE_000_TITLE.text: The Mystery of the Ice Palace's Gates

W12_EVAR_COMM_FENCEGATE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_FENCEGATE_000_DETAIL.text: The giant gates leading to the Ice Palace. Perhaps there's a specific way they need to be opened?

W12_EVAR_COMM_FENCEGATE_005_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_FENCEGATE_005_DETAIL.text: You believe you've gathered all the artifacts you need to break the seal. The time has come to try!

W12_EVAR_COMM_FENCEGATE_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_FENCEGATE_010_DETAIL.text: You've gathered all the artifacts you need to break the seal. The time has come to try!

W12_EVAR_COMM_ICECASTLE_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_ICECASTLE_100_DETAIL.text: This is the palace where the final emperor was sealed. Something good is apparently waiting for you here.

W12_EVAR_COMM_ICECASTLE_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_ICECASTLE_200_DETAIL.text: This is the palace where the final emperor was sealed. Something bad is apparently waiting for you here.

W12_EVAR_COMM_ICECASTLE_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_ICECASTLE_300_DETAIL.text: This is the palace where the final emperor was sealed. You have no idea what could be waiting for you here.

W12_EVAR_COMM_FREE_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_COMM_FREE_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: Fiends have emerged from the mine and are making their way to nearby homes.
